name: Conway's Game Of Life
body:
### Ian's Conway's Game Of Life.
Here is a(n over-engineered) console implementation of Conway's Game Of Life using C#. Just look at it.

# Features
**Fully interactive retro console UI!**
![Welcome](https://github.com/ian-hall/GHGameOfLife/blob/master/Screenshots/screen1.png?raw=true)

**Ability to load your own population file!**
![Loading a population](https://github.com/ian-hall/GHGameOfLife/blob/master/Screenshots/screen6.gif?raw=true)

**Ability to create your own population!**
![Create a population](https://github.com/ian-hall/GHGameOfLife/blob/master/Screenshots/screen3.gif?raw=true)

**Robust error handling!**
![such error](http://i.imgur.com/CUuTaOG.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
